title: What are the best applications of voice recognition? - Quora

response.answer_text: We speak at a rate of 150–200 words per minute We are typing at a rate of 50 words per minute Voice can help us get things done 3x faster in certain circumstances like: Taking NotesSearching for answers on Google HomePlaying our favorite song or changing the temperature at home using AlexaWe’ve seen Voice applications make their way into our homes. I believe over the next 5 years we will see this shift in the workplace where the impact will be even greater. Voice recognition can help people be more productive in meetingsVoice analytics can help call centers achieve 100 quality assuranceVoice assistants can simplify the way we work with complex enterprise applicationsSpeech recognition can help doctors focus on giving better care and have automated documentationThis is why we’re so excited about this space. As speech recognition get’s better, it’s going to become more reliable in the workplace.

Voice technology has come a long way and is now supplementing the text based instructions given to digital devices. You can learn more about the various voice based applications and how the technology is changing the way we do business or communicate at How Voice Technology is Connecting Brands and Customers
